member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.IPhormSessionMock
member.summary: Mock interface to make testing easier.

member.name: T:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.MockPhormSession
member.summary: A functional implementation that makes it easier to mock out Pho/rm logic for testing using the interface.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.MockPhormSession.#ctor(IFY.Phorm.Mockable.IPhormSessionMock)
member.summary: A functional implementation that makes it easier to mock out Pho/rm logic for testing using the interface.

member.name: P:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.MockPhormSession.TransactionId
member.summary: A random ID for a transaction, to make it easy to identify if we're in the same transaction on multiple requests.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.PhormSessionMockExtensions.ToMock(IFY.Phorm.Mockable.IPhormSessionMock)
member.summary: Converts the specified mock session object to an instance of the IPhormSession interface.
member.remarks: Use this method to facilitate testing scenarios where an IPhormSession implementation is required, allowing mock behavior to be injected in place of a real session.
member.param: The mock session object to convert. This parameter cannot be null.
member.returns: An IPhormSession instance that wraps the provided mock session object.

member.name: M:IFY.Phorm.Mockable.PhormSessionMockExtensions.IsLike``1(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether two objects are structurally equivalent based on the contract defined by the specified type.
member.remarks: This method compares the properties defined in the contract type TContract. If both objects are null for a property, they are considered equal. If any property values differ, the method returns false.
member.typeparam: The type that defines the contract for comparison, specifying the structure and properties to evaluate.
member.param: The first object to compare, which may be null.
The second object to compare, which may be null.
member.returns: true if the objects are equivalent according to the contract; otherwise, false.
